an4.17:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these four ways of taking a wrong course. What four? One takes a wrong course because of desire, because of hatred, because of delusion, or because of fear. These are the four ways of taking a wrong course."
an4.17:2: If through desire, hate, fear, or delusionone transgresses against the Dhamma,one's fame diminishes like the moonin the dark fortnight.
